titleStmt.title: The myster[y] of afflictions. Being the substance of a sermon discoursed By W.S. Master of Arts, and Rector of Eskrick.
titleStmt.author: Shipton, William.

notesStmt.note: DFo copy, reel 2371, is stained on the title page, cropped affecting page numbering, and is missing pp.3-4.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
